description:
Impose surface heat flux anomalies to the ocean, calculated from the ensemble mean of the 1pctCO2 simulations at the time of CO2 doubling.
Impose pre-industrial atmospheric conditions.
keywords: FAFMIP, Tier 1, heatFAF, surface heat flux anomaly
long_name: control plus perturbative surface flux of heat into ocean
rationale: Heat flux changes are thought to be the main influence on Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (AMOC) change.

requirements.description: Idealised temporal constraint, repeating 1850 for 70 years
requirements.label: 1850-1851 70yrs

requirements.description: Impose surface heat flux anomalies to the ocean, calculated from the ensemble mean of the 1pctCO2 simulations at the time of CO2 doubling.  Surface flux anomalies (a function of longitude, latitude and time of year) are to remain constant throughout the experiment.  Note that the fluxes themselves are not replaced because this would typically cause a very large climate drift and possible instability.
requirements.keywords: FAFMIP, 1pctCO2, heat flux, 2xCO2, at CO2 doubling
requirements.label: 1pctCO2HeatFluxAnomalyAtDoubling

requirements.description: Add a surface flux of passive tracer at the same rate as the surface heat flux perturbation in the heatFAF experiment.  The passive tracer flux will be added to the top layer of a passive temperature tracer.  Surface flux anomalies (a function of longitude, latitude and time of year) are to remain constant throughout the experiment.
requirements.keywords: FAFMIP, 1pctCO2, heat flux, passive tracer, 2xCO2, at CO2 doubling
requirements.label: 1pctCO2PassiveTracerAtDoubling

requirements.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding carbon dioxide, excluding co2
requirements.label: PIForcingExcludingCO2

requirements.description: Initialisation is made from year 20 of the pre-industrial control.
requirements.label: PreIndustrialInitialisation

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model or an Earth System Model
requirements.keywords: AOGCM, ESM, Atmosphere-Ocean, Earth System, Model, Configuration
requirements.label: AOGCM/ESM Configuration
